data.description: Win 100 games in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Centenary

hero.base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America
hero.name: Reaper
hero.description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.

data.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Reaper's Death Blossom in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Die Die Die... Die

data.description: Play a Quick or Competitive Play game in a group with a friend.
data.name: The Friend Zone

hero.name: Genji
hero.description: Genji flings precise and deadly Shuriken at his targets, and uses his technologically-advanced katana to deflect projectiles or deliver a Swift Strike that cuts down enemies.

data.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Genji's Dragonblade in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Slice and Dice

data.description: Get a 20 player kill streak in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Undying

data.description: Destroy 3 of Symmetra's Teleporters in a single Quick or Competitive Play game.
data.name: The Path Is Closed

data.description: Use health packs to heal 900 health in a single life in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Survival Expert

data.description: Earn 50 postgame medals in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Decorated

data.description: Collect 50 unlocks for a single hero.
data.name: Decked Out

hero.name: Genji
hero.description: Genji flings precise and deadly Shuriken at his targets, and uses his technologically-advanced katana to deflect projectiles or deliver a Swift Strike that cuts down enemies.

data.description: Kill 2 enemies with a single use of Genji's Deflection in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Their Own Worst Enemy

hero.base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America
hero.name: Reaper
hero.description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.

data.description: Get 3 solo kills with a single clip of Reaper's shotguns in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Waste Not, Want Not

hero.name: McCree
hero.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, McCree takes out targets with deadeye precision and dives out of danger with eagle-like speed.

data.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with McCree's Flashbang in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Whoa There!

hero.name: McCree
hero.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, McCree takes out targets with deadeye precision and dives out of danger with eagle-like speed.

data.description: Get 4 killing blows with a single use of McCree's Deadeye in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: It's High Noon

hero.name: Pharah
hero.description: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.

data.description: Kill 4 enemies in a row without touching the ground as Pharah in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Death From Above

hero.name: Pharah
hero.description: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.

data.description: Knock an enemy to their death using Pharah's Concussive Blast in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Clearing the Area

data.description: Earn 21 postgame cards in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Blackjack

hero.name: Soldier: 76
hero.description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered Helix Rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

data.description: Get 2 killing blows with a single use of Soldier: 76's Helix Rockets in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Rocket Man

hero.name: Soldier: 76
hero.description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered Helix Rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

data.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Soldier: 76's Tactical Visor in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Target Rich Environment

hero.name: Tracer
hero.description: Toting twin pulse pistols, energy-based time bombs, and rapid-fire banter, Tracer is able to \blink\" through space and rewind her personal timeline as she battles to right wrongs the world over."""

data.description: Stick 4 of Tracer's Pulse Bombs onto enemies in a single Quick or Competitive Play game.
data.name: Special Delivery

hero.name: Zarya
hero.description: Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her massive Particle Cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle.

data.description: Keep Zarya's particle cannon above 70 power for 60 seconds in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Power Overwhelming

hero.name: Zarya
hero.description: Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her massive Particle Cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle.

data.description: Capture 5 enemies in a single use of Zarya's Graviton Surge in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: The Power of Attraction

hero.name: Lúcio
hero.description: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

data.description: Get 3 killing blows while wall riding as Lúcio without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: The Floor Is Lava

hero.name: Lúcio
hero.description: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

data.description: Block 1000 damage with a single use of Lúcio's Sound Barrier in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Supersonic

hero.name: Mercy
hero.description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

data.description: Restore 200 health for 5 players without dying as Mercy in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Group Health Plan

hero.name: Mercy
hero.description: Mercy’s Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates like a guardian angel; healing, resurrecting or strengthening them with the beams emanating from her Caduceus Staff.

data.description: Resurrect 4 players at once with Mercy in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Huge Rez

hero.name: Symmetra
hero.description: Symmetra utilizes her light-bending Photon Projector to dispatch adversaries, shield her associates, construct teleportation pads and deploy particle-blasting Sentry Turrets.

data.description: Hit an enemy with 7 beams simultaneously as Symmetra in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: The Car Wash

hero.name: Winston
hero.description: Winston wields impressive inventions—a jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more—with literal gorilla strength.

data.description: Damage 6 enemies during a single use of Winston's Primal Rage in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Anger Management

hero.name: Symmetra
hero.description: Symmetra utilizes her light-bending Photon Projector to dispatch adversaries, shield her associates, construct teleportation pads and deploy particle-blasting Sentry Turrets.

data.description: Teleport 20 players in a single Quick or Competitive Play game as Symmetra.
data.name: Huge Success

hero.name: Zenyatta
hero.description: Zenyatta calls upon orbs of harmony and discord to heal his teammates and weaken his opponents, all while pursuing a transcendent state of immunity to damage.

data.description: Restore 1500 health with a single use of Zenyatta's Transcendence in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: The Iris Embraces You

data.description: Win a Capture map on defense without losing the first objective in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Lockdown

data.description: Capture both objectives on a Capture map without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Double Cap

data.description: Push a payload 100 meters without leaving it in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Escort Duty

data.description: Prevent the attacking team from touching the payload for 1 minute in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Can't Touch This

data.description: Win a Control map without the enemy capturing an objective in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Shutout

data.description: Win a Quick or Competitive Play game on 12 different maps.
data.name: World Traveler

hero.name: Zenyatta
hero.description: Zenyatta calls upon orbs of harmony and discord to heal his teammates and weaken his opponents, all while pursuing a transcendent state of immunity to damage.

data.description: Get 4 kills or assists with Zenyatta's Orb of Discord within 6 seconds in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Rapid Discord

hero.name: Tracer
hero.description: Toting twin pulse pistols, energy-based time bombs, and rapid-fire banter, Tracer is able to \blink\" through space and rewind her personal timeline as she battles to right wrongs the world over."""

data.description: Recover 400 health using Tracer's Recall without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Total Recall

hero.name: Winston
hero.description: Winston wields impressive inventions—a jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more—with literal gorilla strength.

data.description: Destroy 10 turrets or traps using Winston's Tesla Cannon without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Mine Sweeper

hero.name: Roadhog
hero.description: Roadhog uses his signature Chain Hook to pull his enemies close before shredding them with blasts from his Scrap Gun. He’s hardy enough to withstand tremendous damage, and can recover his health with a short breather.

data.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with Roadhog's Hook in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Giving You the Hook

hero.name: Bastion
hero.description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

data.description: Kill 2 enemies in each of Bastion's configurations without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Triple Threat

hero.name: Bastion
hero.description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

data.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Bastion's Configuration: Tank in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Charge!

hero.name: Hanzo
hero.description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

data.description: Get 2 killing blows with a single use of Hanzo's Scatter Arrow in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Simple Geometry

hero.name: Hanzo
hero.description: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

data.description: Kill 4 enemies with one of Hanzo's Spirit Dragons in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: The Dragon Is Sated

hero.name: Junkrat
hero.description: Junkrat’s area-denying armaments include a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks.

data.description: Knock an enemy into your Steel Trap using Junkrat's Concussion Mine in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Mine Like a Steel Trap

hero.name: Junkrat
hero.description: Junkrat’s area-denying armaments include a Frag Launcher that lobs bouncing grenades, Concussion Mines that send enemies flying, and Steel Traps that stop foes dead in their tracks.

data.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Junkrat's RIP-Tire in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Roadkill

hero.name: Mei
hero.description: Mei’s weather-altering devices slow opponents and protect locations. Her Endothermic Blaster unleashes damaging icicles and frost streams, and she can Cryo-Freeze herself to guard against counterattacks, or obstruct the opposing team's movements with an Ice Wall.

data.description: Block 1200 damage with a single use of Mei's Ice Wall in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Ice Blocked

hero.name: Roadhog
hero.description: Roadhog uses his signature Chain Hook to pull his enemies close before shredding them with blasts from his Scrap Gun. He’s hardy enough to withstand tremendous damage, and can recover his health with a short breather.

data.description: Knock 2 enemies to their deaths with one use of Roadhog's Whole Hog in Quick or Competitive Play.
data.name: Hog Wild
